author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Puducherry Municipality has ordered closure of abattoirs, meat and fish stalls on January 16 (Saturday) and 24 (Sunday).

Being Thiruvalluvar Day and Vallalar Day respectively, the municipality wanted to enforce the orders strictly on the shop owners.

If the meat shop owners were found violating the order, the municipality would immediately initiate action under the Puducherry Municipalities Act, 1973, a press release said.
title: Municipality orders closure of meat stalls
